Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education.

Items.Title: Oversight - The Role of Artificial Intelligence, Emerging Technology, and Computer Instruction in New York City Public Schools.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Role of Artificial Intelligence, Emerging Technology, and Computer Instruction in New York City Public Schools.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to develop curriculum on machine learning, and adapt their current curriculum and policies to account for the safe use of generative AI.
Items.MatterName: Department of Education to develop curriculum on machine learning, and adapt their current curriculum and policies to account for the safe use of generative AI.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to update its CS4All initiative to increase access to CS4All professional development for educators and administrators, particularly for those in underserved schools, and to increase training for all teachers.
Items.MatterName: Department of Education to update its CS4All initiative to increase access to CS4All professional development for educators and administrators, particularly for those in underserved schools, and to increase training for all teachers.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to mandate training on generative artificial intelligence tools, including for potential classroom implementation, for all educators.
Items.MatterName: Department of Education to mandate training on generative artificial intelligence tools for all educators.
